data.message: when one reports a fake facebook site or facebook post you should give us the option to report them for committing fraud or deceiving the public (that should be a reason alone). NO be blocking them will not solve the situation. A lot of older people (grandparents) fall for these scams. Give us the option to click "this person is trying to commit a fraudulent act" or something like that please... Fake disney sites, fake "free vacation" sites, fake student loan relief sites. It gets tiring to see people falling for this.

replies.message: Thanks for the suggestion, Tatianna. We appreciate feedback from the community. You can submit ideas to improve the Facebook experience at http://bit.ly/2drM7eT. -Nick

I would like to reiterate what the poster above said.  There are so many scammers on FB (and a lot of other places as well).  The scammers should not just be "blocked" but should be called out for what they are and deleted.  There are rings of scammers in various places who set up FB pages with stolen pictures.  Look at VanRobert Hawkins, which I reported.  That page has stolen pictures of an army chaplain.  Then, Jeffrey Hawkins (which is actually the name of the Army Chaplain).  But, I can guarantee you that the real Army Chaplain Col. Jeffrey Hawkins DID NOT set up that FB page.   The person who stole Col. Hawkins pictures set it up and brazenly used the Col's real name.   This stuff needs to be stopped by Facebook.

Facebook Hallo Facebook. My sisters account is disabled since last monday and we can not log in,. we submit an appeal and sent a copy of passport and driving license, but nothing happend? Is there any way to get her account? she had facebook about 10 years ago and this is the first time it happened!! How many days shal she wait to get an answer from you? I called your phone nr yesterday and i talked about an hour in the phone and facebook asked me to pay 500 dollar to get the account. I didnt believe that. is that real?

Is there any way to be able to get the account? and how many days/weeks it will take? My sister is very sad and she doesnot want to make a new account. she has many files and documents on her facebook, and she needs them. Facebook is her her life and she is very happy to have it. It is the only way she can communicate with the family and friends, and she really needs it. please help my sister. Thank you very much
Hi Facebook how to return it back my page on my iPhone when I see it is blank no picture maybe I don't have wifi or full my pages is a that right?
